name: Last Kiss Before Summer
summary: An unknown illness has gripped you since birth, stranding you indoors most of your life. Despite this, you've spent your days happily learning about the world around you. But recently, your illness has progressed rapidly, leaving you with only 33 days left to live! Determined to make the most of your time, you enroll in school and seek out experiences you’ve never had before—like love. Will your last days be as blissful as you’d hoped?
